title: New: Eric En – Moon I
content:
So this is a little bit special.

Eric En, a Montreal based singer/songwriter aided by his cousin Huy Nguyen on production duties, has crafted one of the most alluring pieces of music I’ve heard this year thus far. Whilst Eric’s Soundcloud is slightly haphazard in nature, overflowing with snippets and ideas (scribbles as he affectionately calls them), all showcasing potential yet none quite achieve the sheer beauty of this new track. A no strings attached piano ballad, Moon I is fragile, tender and an intimately rewarding listen, echoing the likes of Gem Club and more ‘commercial’ James Blake. I’m overflowing with excitement. Check out the gorgeous Moon I below and keep up with Eric via his blog.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
